description.narrative: EAPR has strengthened evidence, partnerships and resurce mobilization capacity to improve EDUCATION outcomes., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: EAPR effectively leverages and utilises resources, strategic partnerships, innovations, data and evidence to drive results for children

sector.narrative: Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
Education sector planning including coordinating role, SDG 4, etc.
Provision of early learning / pre-primary education teacher training
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
System strengthening - mainstreaming of skills development within national education/training system
System strengthening - risk informed programming, including climate, resilience, disaster, conflict, and emergency preparedness

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: EAPR has strengthened evidence, partnerships and resurce mobilization capacity to improve EDUCATION outcomes.

description.narrative: In alignment with UNICEF Strategic Plan, Regional Headline Results as well as the new Global Education Strategy, RO Education Team has further advanced its leadership in key initiatives including early learning, inclusive and quality primary education, adolescent and second-decade education, education in emergencies and climate change, and education system strengthening and governance. It also enhanced stronger partnerships to move forward the SDG4 agenda and deliver strategic results for children and adolescents in the region. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:28/08/2020

title.narrative: Number of regional guidance, position papers or strategies produced and/or disseminated on key thematic areas (incl. Pre-schooling/Early learning, multi-grade schooling, SRGBV, Learning, OOSC, secondary education and adolescent learning, education for migrants, etc.).
Number of strategic partnership maintained or newly built with regional/global stakeholders (incl. UN agencies, regional institutions/networks, CSOs, academia etc.) to further support the countries
"Number of regional tools and multi-country iniativies to improve children's learning and education. a) A set of regional tools/standardsl on learning assessment b) Multi-country initatives (COs-RO)"
